[https://corgitech.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=10](https://corgitech.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=10) and use code : **CORGI50**

Test IP and files for both locations can be found at the bottom of our VPS page : [http://www.corgitech.com/linux_vps.html](http://www.corgitech.com/linux_vps.html)
